add.title: Evaluate Fields
add.description: Set of key-value pairs to evaluate and add/set

value.title: Value Expression
value.description: JavaScript expression to compute the value (can be constant)

keep.title: Keep Fields
keep.description: List of fields to keep, supports * wildcards. Takes precedence over 'Remove Fields'.

remove.title: Remove Fields
remove.description: List of fields to remove, supports * wildcards. Cannot remove fields matching 'Keep Fields'.
